events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund processing and customer returns.
Hello! I’m Sarah from support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, please share details such as your order ID and reason for the refund request.
Thank you for responding. My order number is 7845123. I simply changed my mind and want to return the item for a refund.
We can initiate your refund as soon as you return the product. I will email you the return shipping label today.
Thanks for the help! I appreciate the quick response and will send back the item as soon as I receive the label.
Your return label has been sent via email. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email to help us improve our service. Your feedback is very valuable.
